name: Dream Chronicles
description:
Dream Chronicles is a game developed by KatGames. It came out on 12-06-2007. It was published by PlayFirst. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dream Chronicles on PC and PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Kenny Dinkin. It was directed by Miguel Tartaj. Adam Gubman, Kane Minkus and Nick Thomas scored the game.
